SELECT /* PDMD0020.SEARCH00.제작 명세서 -제작명세서 헤더 *//* [제작명세서 헤더 조회] */ A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,B.JOBN_NAME /*제작명*/ ,A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ ,A.ESTI_AMTX /*견적금액*/ ,A.DEND_AMTX /*청구금액*/ ,A.SUJU_AMTX /*정산금액*/ ,B.STAT_FLAG /*제작상태*/ ,B.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*광고주명*/ ,B.DEND_DATE /*청구일자*/ ,B.MEDA_CODE /*제작종류*/ ,B.HIGH_LEVL /*제작내용*/ ,B.USEX_TYPE /*제작용도*/ ,B.REQU_DATE /*의뢰일*/ ,B.COMP_DATE /*완료희망일*/ ,DECODE(C.BIZR_NUMB,NULL,C.RERN_NUMB,C.BIZR_NUMB) AS BIZR_NUMB /* 사업자번호 */ FROM PD_SUJUMH A /* [제작명세서 제작용 헤더] */ LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.PREE_CODE

SELECT /* PDMD0020.SEARCH01.제작 정산 -정산 하단 상세 조회*//* [제작정산 하단 상세 조회] */ '0' CHK /*선택*/ ,A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ ,A.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,A.PREE_IDXX /*견적순번*/ ,A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,A.ITEM_CODE /*분류항목코드*/ ,B.HIGH_NAME /*대분류명*/ ,B.MIDD_NAME /*중분류명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,A.TYPE_QTYX /*수량*/ ,A.ESTI_PRCE /*단가*/ ,NVL(A.ESTI_AMTX,'') AS ESTI_AMTX /*견적금액*/ ,NVL(A.DEND_AMTX,'') AS DEND_AMTX /*청구금액*/ ,NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,'') AS SUJU_AMTX /*정산금액*/ ,A.OUTS_CODE /*제작사코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*제작사명*/ ,A.SORT_ORDR /*정렬순번*/ FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR, A.ITEM_CODE, A.PREE_CODE , A.PREE_IDXX
SELECT CLAS_TYPE ,HIGH_LEVL AS COMB_CODE /*대분류코드*/ ,HIGH_NAME AS COMB_NAME /*대분류명*/ FROM PD_ITEMXH GROUP BY CLAS_TYPE,HIGH_LEVL, HIGH_NAME
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PD_SUJUMD ( /* PDMD0020.SAVE01.제작 정산 -정산 하단 상세 저장*//* [제작정산 하단 상세 저장] */ PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ ,PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ ,PREE_IDXX /* 견적순번 */ ,ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ ,JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,ITEM_CODE /* 제작항목 */ ,TYPE_QTYX /* 수량 */ ,ESTI_PRCE /* 견적단가 */ ,ESTI_AMTX /* 견적금액 */ ,DEND_AMTX /* 청구금액 */ ,SUJU_AMTX /* 정산금액 */ ,OUTS_CODE /* 제작사코드 */ ,CONT_NUMB /* 계약서번호 */ ,SUJU_DATE /* 정산일자 */ ,MEMO_FILD /* 비고내역 */ ,SORT_ORDR /* 정렬구분 */ ,REF1_FILD /* 여분1 */ ,REF2_FILD /* 여분2 */ ,REF3_FILD /* 여분3 */ ,REF4_FILD /* 여분4 */ ,INST_USID /* 생성자 */ ,INST_DATE /* 생성일자 */ ,UPDT_USID /* 수정자 */ ,UPDT_DATE /* 수정일자 */ ) VALUES ( #PREE_CODE# /* 견적번호 */ ,#PREE_NAME# /* 견적명 */ ,#PREE_IDXX# /* 견적순번 */ ,#ESTI_DATE# /* 견적일자 */ ,#JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ ,#ITEM_CODE# /* 제작항목 */ ,#TYPE_QTYX# /* 수량 */ ,#ESTI_PRCE# /* 견적단가 */ ,#ESTI_AMTX# /* 견적금액 */ ,#DEND_AMTX# /* 청구금액 */ ,#SUJU_AMTX# /* 정산금액 */ ,#OUTS_CODE# /* 제작사코드 */ ,#CONT_NUMB# /* 계약서번호 */ ,#SUJU_DATE# /* 정산일자 */ ,#MEMO_FILD# /* 비고내역 */ ,#SORT_ORDR# /* 정렬구분 */ ,#REF1_FILD# /* 여분1 */ ,#REF2_FILD# /* 여분2 */ ,#REF3_FILD# /* 여분3 */ ,#REF4_FILD# /* 여분4 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /*입력작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ ,#UPDT_USID# /*수정작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*수정일시*/ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PD_SUJUMD /* PDMD0020.UPDATE01.제작 정산 -정산 상세 데이터 수정*//* [제작정산 하단 상세 수정] */ SET PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# /* 견적번호 */ , PREE_NAME = #PREE_NAME# /* 견적명 */ , PREE_IDXX = #PREE_IDXX# /* 견적순번 */ , ESTI_DATE = #ESTI_DATE# /* 견적일자 */ , JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ , ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# /* 제작항목 */ , TYPE_QTYX = #TYPE_QTYX# /* 수량 */ , ESTI_PRCE = #ESTI_PRCE# /* 견적단가 */ , ESTI_AMTX = #ESTI_AMTX# /* 견적금액 */ , DEND_AMTX = #DEND_AMTX# /* 청구금액 */ , SUJU_AMTX = #SUJU_AMTX# /* 정산금액 */ , OUTS_CODE = #OUTS_CODE# /* 제작사코드 */ , CONT_NUMB = #CONT_NUMB# /* 계약서번호 */ , SUJU_DATE = #SUJU_DATE# /* 정산일자 */ , MEMO_FILD = #MEMO_FILD# /* 비고내역 */ , SORT_ORDR = #SORT_ORDR# /* 정렬구분 */ , REF1_FILD = #REF1_FILD# /* 여분1 */ , REF2_FILD = #REF2_FILD# /* 여분2 */ , REF3_FILD = #REF3_FILD# /* 여분3 */ , REF4_FILD = #REF4_FILD# /* 여분4 */ , UPDT_USID = #UPDT_USID# /*수정자*/ ,UPDT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# /* 견적번호 */ AND PREE_IDXX = #PREE_IDXX# /* 견적순번 */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CAST(NVL(MAX(PREE_IDXX),0) AS NUMERIC) + 1 FROM PD_SUJUMD WHERE PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#

UPDATE PD_SUJUMH SET ESTI_AMTX = ( SELECT NVL(SUM(ESTI_AMTX),0) FROM PD_SUJUMD WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ) , DEND_AMTX = ( SELECT NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX),0) FROM PD_SUJUMD WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ) , SUJU_AMTX = ( SELECT NVL(SUM(SUJU_AMTX),0) FROM PD_SUJUMD WHERE 1=1 AND PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# )
WHERE PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* PDMD0020.PRINT00.제작 명세서 출력 헤더조회 *//* [제작 명세서 헤더 출력 조회] */ B.JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,B.JOBN_NAME /* 제작명 */ ,C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ ,B.JOBN_SIZE /* 규격*/ , F.OFFI_NAME AS HOME_NAME /* 농심기획 */ , F.ADDR_DESC AS HOME_ADDR /* 농심기획주소 */ , F.BSNS_NUMB /* 농심기획사업자번호 */ , F.OWNR_NAME AS HOME_OWNR /* 농심기획대표자 */ , #PRNT_DATE# AS PRNT_DATE FROM PD_SUJUMH A RIGHT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE F ON F.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND F.OFFI_GUBN ='1' WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB#

SELECT /* PDMD0020.PRINT01.제작 명세서 하단 상세조회*//* [제작명세서 출력 상세 디테일 조회] */ A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,A.ITEM_CODE /*분류항목코드*/ ,B.HIGH_NAME /*대분류명*/ ,B.MIDD_NAME /*중분류명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME AS ITEM_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,A.TYPE_QTYX /*수량*/ ,A.ESTI_PRCE /*단가*/ ,DEND_AMTX AS ESTI_AMTX /*금액*/ ,A.SORT_ORDR /*정렬순번*/ FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR, A.ITEM_CODE, A.PREE_CODE , A.PREE_IDXX
